data.text:
My  wife and I have stayed in several Park Hyatt hotels. All have been very good. Until now we believed the Park Hyatt in Shanghai to be the best,however we have found the Park Hyatt Dubai to be in a class of its own.
The hotel and its facilities are simply superb. 
This is matched by really an amazing staff. We have only experienced this level of service in Mauritius. 
We cannot recommend this hotel highly enough. We should add a special thanks to Manuel and Miguel whoâ€™s efforts left nothing to chance 

Geoff and Mary near Birmingham England
data.title: Exceeding expectations. An oasis for relaxation

data.text: We loved our stay at the Park Hyatt. Through our entire stay everyone was very friendly and showed great attention to detail! We loved the variety of the restaurants and the different options for kids and adults (only)! Special thanks goes to Jana, Vivian and Analyn of the Cave Kids Club, who kept my 8 year old son happy and occupied in a creative and engaging way! Hopefully see you soon again Park Hyatt Team!
data.title: Park Hyatt Dubai any time again

data.text: We stayed here for 3 nights as an overlay before going to the Maldives. We were given a lovely lagoon view room. The Saturday brunch was brilliant and the food at the boardwalk was nice. We sat at the adult pool during the day where the service was really good and the atmosphere was calm.  Would love more time to explore this hotel. V close the airport so handy for lay over stays or weekends away.
data.title: Lovely hotel with a sophisticated vibe

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear 622alexq,

Thank you for choosing to stay with us at Park Hyatt Dubai for your three-night overlay before heading to the Maldives.

We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your stay in our lovely lagoon view room and that our Saturday brunch left a lasting impression. It's wonderful to know that you found the food at Boardwalk enjoyable and that you were able to relax and unwind at our adult pool, experiencing excellent service and a serene atmosphere.

We share your sentiment in wishing you had more time to explore our hotel further. We take pride in offering a multitude of experiences and amenities for our guests to enjoy, and we hope to have the pleasure of welcoming you back for a more extended stay in the future.

Being conveniently located close to the airport, we are thrilled that our hotel served as a convenient and enjoyable stopover for your journey to the Maldives or for weekend getaways.

Thank you once again for your kind words, and we look forward to the opportunity to host you again at Park Hyatt Dubai.

Warm regards,

Alexandre Giumella
Rooms Division Manager
owner_response.author: Alexandre Giumella

data.text: Love this place have stayed in other much more expensive places and did not experience the experience did not always match the price tag but this place is wonderful. Big rooms with lovely interia, good food, lovely pools and gardens to enjoy
data.title: One of the best hotels

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Jowita G,

Thank you immensely for your glowing review and for choosing Park Hyatt Dubai as your destination of choice.

We are truly honored to learn that your experience with us surpassed those of other establishments, regardless of their higher price tags. Your recognition of our efforts to deliver exceptional service and experiences despite the cost differential is deeply appreciated.

It brings us great joy to know that you found our spacious rooms with exquisite interiors, delectable culinary offerings, and picturesque pools and gardens to your liking. Your satisfaction is our utmost reward, and we are thrilled to have contributed to your memorable stay with us.

We eagerly await the opportunity to welcome you back to Park Hyatt Dubai for another delightful experience, creating more cherished memories together.

Warm regards,

Alexandre Giumella
Rooms Division Manager
owner_response.author: Alexandre Giumella

data.text: I was at Park Hyatt Dubai in February 2024. The hotel meets the high standards of Park Hyatt, it's not 5*, it's better. 10 minutes to the airport. Beautiful pool with sand and sea water. Excellently selected and attentive staff. When I got sick, hot tea and honey were brought to the room every evening. Very good restaurants and bars on site. There is no better place to combine a business trip and rest in Dubai.
data.title: Borodin Alex I've been staying at this hotel for 6 years

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear V419TU_,

Thank you very much for taking the time to share your wonderful experience at Park Hyatt Dubai during your visit in February 2024.

It brings us immense joy to hear that our hotel not only met but exceeded your expectations, showcasing the essence of the Park Hyatt brand. Your kind words regarding our convenient location, unique pool with sand and sea water, attentive staff, and the thoughtful gesture of hot tea and honey delivery during your illness truly warm our hearts.

We are thrilled to have been a part of your successful business trip combined with leisure in Dubai. Your satisfaction is our utmost priority, and we are delighted to have provided you with a memorable stay.

We look forward to welcoming you back to Park Hyatt Dubai in the near future for another exceptional experience.

Warm regards,

Alexandre Giumella
Rooms Division Manager
owner_response.author: Alexandre Giumella
